skill.name: doc-squeeze-free
skill.description: Reads any documentation URL and returns clean, filtered markdown. Powered by Jina Reader (free) + Groq LLM (free).
skill.author: openclaw

tools.name: squeeze_url
tools.description: Fetches a documentation URL and returns its content as clean markdown. Optionally filters to a specific topic using an LLM.

url.description: The full URL of the documentation page to read.

focus.description: Optional topic to filter the documentation to (e.g., 'authentication', 'error handling', 'rate limits'). When provided, an LLM extracts only relevant sections.

markdown.description: The documentation content as clean markdown.

source.description: The upstream provider used for fetching.

char_count.description: Character count of the returned markdown.

errors.description: Invalid URL or Jina returned empty content.

examples.name: Basic fetch
examples.description: Fetch full Stripe API docs as markdown.

examples.name: Focused fetch
examples.description: Fetch only error-handling sections from Stripe docs.

network.reason: Fetches documentation URLs as markdown via Jina Reader API.
Optional LLM-based filtering when a focus topic is provided.

secrets.description: Groq API key for LLM filtering. Free at https://console.groq.com/keys
